hibernate-mapping.sql-query: update EO_WORK_ORDER T set T.EOWO_TRANS_TYPE_CODE = :eowoTransTypeCode, T.EOWO_LINE_CODE = :eowoLineCode, T.EOWO_LINE_NAME = :eowoLineName, T.EOWO_MILEAGE = :eowoMileage, T.EOWO_CARRIERS_CODE = :eowoCarriersCode, T.EOWO_CARRIERS_NAME = :eowoCarriersName where t.eowo_work_order_no in (:eowoWorkOrderNos)
